content.text: This is Bulbasaur, the Grass/Poison-type Pokémon! It's the #001 Pokémon in the National Pokédex and one of the original starter Pokémon from the Kanto region. Bulbasaur has a distinctive blue-green body with darker green spots, red eyes, and a large green bulb on its back. It's known for being a gentle, loyal Pokémon that can use the bulb on its back to absorb sunlight and convert it into energy for various grass-type attacks.
